Screenfloat - keep an image in the foreground

  • Apr 23, 2014 |
  • How I Work

Applications for Mac may be mostly dead as mobile becomes dominant. But as Miracle Max proved once before, that which is mostly dead can still come back in the form of a giant fiery pirate.

Below you can see I used Screenfloat (which lives in the menu bar) to snap a photo of a table in excel. That photo is no hovering over all other applications, including the word document I’m currently writing in.

Thanks Screenfloat
